name: Jinba
long_description:
Jinba lets enterprise teams vibe-code AI workflows instead of drag and drop. Describe what you need in plain language, and your whole company can start using it immediately. No engineers required. Enterprise-grade permissions, audit logging, and on-prem deployment built in. We serve 40,000 enterprise users at major financial institutions.

Build something your colleagues want.
one_liner: Automate any enterprise workflow through chat
